long_description: The simple, user-friendly Prism Designs Stowaway Delta Kite lets you enjoy the high-tech look of a sport kite without the complication and learning curve. Light, single-liner design folds down from a 5-ft. wingspan to 18 in., making it easy to take just about anywhere. Tough fiberglass frame and counterweighted spine support the kite in a wide range of wind speeds; stable, high flying angle allows quick altitude gain. Rods spring into their connectors with internal bungee cords, just like a tent pole. Optional tails (not included) can be attached at the wing tips and spine for added flair. Prism Designs Stowaway Delta Kite comes with 200 ft. of premium braided Dacron kite string on a hoop winder and a handy travel sleeve.
short_description: The simple, user-friendly Prism Designs Stowaway Delta Kite lets you enjoy the high-tech look of a sport kite without the complication and learning curve.
